i was outside with my sister at 11 pm and we was looking the bloodmoon at this day and a 6 red lights come over me and still stand in the sky and my feelings was adrenalin and scared but was unbelivable and i look at my feets and back in sky and nothing more there just the moon  and i went home.
after that was a attack on police overall police because someone robbed a bank i looked out the window and was maybe 40 police and a helicopter my friend come home i said look ou the window and again 12 lights in a formation in the sky no loud no move so my friend and me starts a video and at the video the lights moved so fats in every side and changing her color to red blue green silver gold black white and wihout the video they just stil stand maybe they was so fast and the helicopter from police saw it tho and fly higher and scared and fly away and my handy had problems and the light fly fats away next day i want saw the video i maked one with 6 minuts and one with 14 seconds the 6 minuts was deleted from alone and the 14 seconds i try to look and my handy freeze and i had to buyed new one my friend sent me his video i put in in myvideo.De but all write fake but wasnt and myvideo deletet is because they thinks was  fake that was the firts story.

content.summary: I saw ufos aliensns they touched me is saw things.. they scare me things they was unbelivable and wnat u to hear this storrys

content.detailedDescription: On feruary 28th 2010 i was sitting across from my aunt paula at her kitchen table it was approxamitly midnight and she was describing her ufo experiences to me. i looked up to answer a question she had asked me when i saw a very bright white beam of light come down through the ceiling and flash behind her. the beam was about the size of a tennis ball and had a few jagged edges. the only thing i can compare it to is a lightning bolt. at first i didnt say anything but it was so extraordinary i had to tell her. she went on to tell me about a recording of crop circle tones she had, she played them for me and we decided to take a drive. before we left i said out loud "i am totally open and i hope you will show yourself to me." we got into her car, put the crop circle tones on the radio and drove to the highest point on the mountain where she lives. we pulled into a turnout, turned the engine off and started casually talking, i was so into the conversation we were having that i didnt really expect to see anything. within a few minutes i saw the same beam of light shoot down from the sky into her window and illuminate the front of her shirt.It was a very foggy night and we coulnt see anything around us. it was like a white sheet surrounded the car. a few seconds later the beam came down again in the same spot. we looked at each other and said wow did you see that! we sat in that spot for a few more minutes before we decided to move a little further down the road. as soon as we moved and turned the car off the beam came down again right outside the drivers side window. we decided to slowly keep moving down the road and every time we moved and turned the car off the beam would come down into the drivers side of the car. i was a little anxious before we left the house because i didnt know what to expect, but when i saw the beams of light a calm feeling came over me. my aunt and i think that us seeing the lights was a show of approval for the experieces she had shared with me earlier in the night.
content.summary: Beam of light:

content.detailedDescription: I recieved a cell phone call from a friend at around 9pm saturday, 2/27. not wanting to disturb my wife i went out to my front yard to talk with him, i was watching aircraft take off from sjc as i was talking to my friend when something caught my eye, at first i thought it was a plastic grocery bag caught in a "thermal" then thought it was a parachute flare that had gone out? then i watched this object change shape, like a square "sheet" to a teardrop then back. i told my friend what i was seeing, he thought it may hay have been a uav from lockheed/martin based out of moffatt field. i watched this "shape" making no sound moving from north to south at a slow speed, then make a left turn east and dissapear behind the treeline! i really had no idea what i was seeing, it was transparent almost translucent, making no sound, i had no idea what i was seeing. i don't know wheather this was ours or theirs? but i did see something and i don't know what it was?
content.summary: Changing square shape, no sound, approx. 400 ft elev. moving south

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking along main road, roswell, on my way to find some dinner. i was walking in the direction away from the heart of roswell.
at approximately 5.30pm i saw an object travelling through the sky which at first i thought to be a balloon. it seemed to be as small or maybe a touch bigger than a ballon but as it came nearer i noticed it was not a balloon. it appeared greyish/metallic/aluminum in colour and travelled at a good speed in a straight line though with a bobbing/rocking motion.
i took two photographs with my camera on full zoom. the camera is a canon powershot s200. i could only take two quick snaps as my battery had died and i did not have a charger.
any idea what this could be?
content.summary: Sighting of ufo in skies over roswell

content.detailedDescription:
To start with i build & install dvr surveillance systems and this was caught on one of my very high end bosch true ir camera.  i was on the phone with a customer giving him a live view of the cameras showing how they worked.  this camera is on a pan/tilt 360 mount, so i was moving the camera all over to show him how it worked. we started to talk again and i had left the camera aiming up towards the southern sky. then him and i both saw it fly through the shot and i told him it was probability a bird.  so i took the chance to show him the on-line replay.When looking back i new at once it was some sort of ufo, but not just one....In playback  i saw there was two and very clear.  i also analyze video for customers and police so i'm very good at it.  i worked on it for hours and they appear to be two triangle crafts moving very fast from west to east.  what the real clincher for me was is that the top craft went in and out of the clouds, proving the where not a illusion or something on the lens.

it happened so fast there where really no feeling at the time, but when i played it back i just about had a heart attack because i new what it was at once without a doubt.

i left the camera aimed at that same place for about a week, and they never them fly by again.
content.summary: Two very fast moving ufo's cought on high end surveillance camera.

content.detailedDescription:
Last august while living in portland, oregon, i attempted to take a picture of the meteoroid shower at 3:15 am with my arm extended out of the bathroom window. my digital camera picked up the following attached image. the next day i sent this photo to the local tv station, kgw they never acknowledged this, neither did several other email contacts.
 
now i live in idaho falls, and the other night i was watching ufo's on the a&e channel where i was reminded of this photo i took.
 
"please relate if anyone has seen a similar object. as this is an authentic exposure taken in portland, oregon during the august nightly meteoroid showers.
 
thank you

Place:  homestead looking west to everglades/redlands

driving south on the florida turnpike at approximate mile marker 4-8


my friend and i were driving home from work and noticed what we thought was a large meteor falling from the sky.  the meteor was falling for a much longer duration and was significantly larger that i was accustomed to seeing.  it looked like a burning fireball traveling at a high speed similar to a meteor.  it kept falling and then split into two smaller burning fireballs and continued to fall.  i was concerned it would impact the earth but before they hit the ground each meteor split into two orbs or lights (thus four total) and each light turned and travelled horizontal to the ground for several miles.  we then noticed a fifth and all five were travelling at different speeds to the west.  we watched them fly for several minutes. they did not fly in any formation and appeared to be travelling at different speeds and altitudes and they appeared to bounce around a little.  next, we could not believe our eyes when we noticed a second fireball that did the exact same thing.  there were 10 orbs or lights total traveling in two groups of five towards the west.  we watched them for about 5 minutes until they were so far away they 'set' on the horizon.  the lights were white with no color and we figured we watched them travel 12-17 miles or more above the ground.

this event was so unbelievable, i was shaking and in such awe i could not find my hazard lights on the car when i pulled over and we were both so 'flustered' we could not figure out how to use the phone camera.  i did not want to take my eye off it for a second.    

there was at least one other car pulled over on the side of the road with the passengers outside the car looking at the sky.
content.summary: 2 meteor looking obects fall/burn up and reveal 5 (each) orbs that travel 7 miles in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On or about feb23 aprox 12am to 1am my brotherin law had a strange event happen.He was going outside for a smoke when he noticed our tv on. which was odd because my wife and myself were sleeping in our room .He was talking to our daughter on the phone and told her ,thats odd the tv is on.Then he said oh well i'llcheck on it after my smoke.He was standing on the porch talking on the phone when all of a sudden he said it was like a flash but more like an illumination happened like going from night to day and back  then all of a sudden his phone went dead,then our daughter called back and asked what happened?He proceeded to tell her of the flash while going in the house to check whats up with the tv in the living room it was still on then  he turned it off.He noticedthat our one lamp was on in our room he thought we were up or seen the flash.We were fast asleep he thought odd lights on tv on we were asleep . 
  went to his room and check on his tv .His was on but not working said searching for satelite.I told him how to reset the reciever on the tv its was going out prior in the week.As soon as he hit the reset buttton on the reciever his light in his bedroom went really bright then the power went out,then came back on.He went to check the rest of the house and noticed the tv in the family room was on again and all of our digital clocks were  flashing the tv in the family room could not be turned off so he left it didn't wan't to break anything.He told me about the event the next day and i remember waking up and said what is my light doing on shut it off tried to go back to sleep decieded to go to the bathroom i noticed my alarm clock was flashing at 5:42.Latter thinking about the whole event i was thinking it all odd that icannot seem to figure this out .If the event happened at 12-1am and i always wake up every night at least 3 time s to go to the bathroom that night i dont remember waking up at all untill i seen my light on at 5:42weird ha/ also i did some checking this thing happened in rochester ny and north carolina different nights what is going on?
content.summary: Power outage, lights &tv t urn on &off dog freaks, the nightime sky turned to day.

content.detailedDescription:
In the spring of 2006 i lived in acme, washington. one night while looking at the night sky i watched what appeared to be a single airplane light whose path of travel was heading east and just above my house. 

there was no airplane engine or jet sound, just silence.  the sky is so dark and clear at times in washington that i often look at stars etc. the light was at airplane height as i watched it anticipating nothing. then - and this might be coincidental - just as the light passed overhead it expanded to 30 to 50 times the area. it did not shoot down like a search light.  it just expanded in a contained area.  what i mean is....It appeared to be contained, it didn't have a fuzy edge, it just glowed. the light continued at the same pace as it passed overhead. after passing, it reduced to the smaller airplane light size and stayed its course until i lost sight of it. (it didn't travel very fast and was not exceptionally slow.)

the ufo part of this is the whole silent large contained light, and the fact that i felt as though it was looking at me. was it looking at me?  i don't know.  it just traveled its straight path east, and i never saw anything like it again.
content.summary: A single light that appeared tp be an airplane light expanded to times 30 to 50

content.detailedDescription:
Only my mom and i know about this, we have not shared this with anyone.  i am a 44 year old police sergeant with prior military service.  i wanted to put this out there.  i'm a cynical , skeptical person and would not believe in ufos if i did not experience it myself.  

it was a warm summer day and i was a 12 year old boy at the time.  i used to walk about a half mile back to a pond on my grandpas farm to catch frogs and salamanders.  as i was walking back home through the fields, the hair on the back of my neck stood up and i felt like someone was watching me.  i could not hear any noise, but i noticed the birds and animals stopped their noises. i looked behind me and did not see anything.  a voice inside of my head said "look up".  i looked up and noticed a metallic looking disc shaped saucer in the air.  it was a perfect circle, had no lights and was a dull grey/silver color.  it hovered about 200 feet directly over me as i stood there in a kind of shock.  the disc was fairly small, maybe 30-35 feet from end to end.

the next thought in my head, which was what i can only guess now was some type of telepathy, was "don't be afraid, we won't hurt you".

i felt a peculiar sensation for what seemed to be 10 seconds.  i only felt the same thing years later.  it was a vibration throughout my body.  i went to a rock and roll concert where there were dozens of large speakers set up.  i was in the front row right in front of the speakers and the vibration was quite similar, but with very loud music and this thing was silent.

this thing never emitted any noise, smoke, or flame.  i broke out of my short trance as every hair in my body was on end.  i ran through the fields and screamed for my mom who came running out into the back yard to see what was wrong.  she looked at this saucer and her mouth just dropped open.  now here is the really interesting part that tells me this was definitely an alien craft.  it hovered for 4-5 seconds near us.

it was still hovering but had risen to about 1000 feet by then; i never could discern a cockpit or bubble on top.  now we lived on top of a hill in the hudson valley at the following lat/long:  42 degrees 24'26.08"n and 74 degrees 03'18.62"w.  this saucer, without any noise or smoke etc. shot off at an incredible speed over the catskill mountains.  it was a clear day also.  it flew over the mountains past hunter/windham in a straight line while ascending gradually to clear the mountain tops by about 1000 feet and disappeared at 42 degrees 19'49.40"n, and 74 degrees 14'25.06"w which is a distance i measured at about 12 miles with googleearth  (in 3 seconds).  this extrapolates to 4 miles a second or 14,800 mph!  i have been in the military and nothing we had, especially back then, could go anywhere near that fast.  it takes the shuttle almost a full orbit with 3 large fuel tanks to build up that kind of speed and i always heard sonic booms with military aircraft at mach speeds.  this thing was intelligent, fast, and not of this world.  there were other sitings in the hudson valley in 76/77 but these were mostly odd hovering multi colored lights at night.  i can't remember much else about the experience and i wish i could give you a better time frame.  we told a few family members but no one believed us.  my mom still lives up in new york but i have moved to florida.  i must say there is something out there and i went from a skeptic to a believer.  i don't really want contact and am not looking for any attention.  i just wanted to put it out there in case anyone had something similar happen to them.  i always wondered what would have happened if i just stood there.
content.summary: Hovered, some type of contact, flew away.

content.detailedDescription:
I was shoveling my deck with a friend after the big mid-atlantic snow storm on february 6th.  while shoveling, i happended to look up and saw 2 bright lights, approximately one finger width apart.  my initial thought was, ���those planes are close or going to hit each other���.  a few seconds after i saw the lights, i quickly asked me friend to check the objects out.  at this point we are both observing the two lights.  i love astronomy and know star/planet positions very well- the 2 lights were in the northeast from my position, and planets would never be in this part of the sky.

the details: the lights were the magnitude of venus, very bright, a steady light (like a planet looks, no twinkles like a star).  in fact, it looked like 2 venus���s in the northeast sky at 8pm eastern time usa.  i held my hand up to see if the lights were moving; i thought maybe they were flares.  there was no movement. i was in the military and know how flares move.   the lights were 45 degrees from each other; the one right was higher, left lower.

my friend and i kept observing, asking ���what the heck is that?��� for about 2 minutes. then the light on the bottom left winked out slowly, and 2 seconds later, the one on the right winked out.  there was no movement across the sky; it looked like they were moving away from our viewing position, or disappearing.   there were no more sightings after that. 

more info- i live in an area where you see the commercial planes flying west out of philadelphia.   while we were observing the 2 objects, they disappeared while a plane flying out of philadelphia came between us and our viewing position of the objects.   using the plane as an altitude reference, the lights were higher.
content.summary: Two stationary objects

content.detailedDescription:
Last night as my wife and i were standing on the back stairs smoking , we both witnesses a glowing object come from left to right,high in the sky over are house. the object traveled was very bright and  very abruptly stopped and shot almost completely straight up out of sight. within a few seconds of its disappearance, we both witnessed a helicopter with a search light in the area of about were we seen it disappear. after about 20 minutes, the helicopter left.



now, also over the past month or , both my wife and i together and alone, have witnessed several bright orange  balls of light  in the horizon at the front of our home that all suddenly disappear. one ,we watched for approximately 30 minutes and as it passed over relatively close to our position. it was round, large and had several multi colored light on it.
i live near a private airstrip , a municipal airport and 2 military installations , aircraft passing over are home is nothing new to use and we have learned to distinguish between stars , airplanes helicopters and what not. none of these things we have seen even come close to resembling any of the normal aircraft we come across out here
content.summary: Several strange objects

content.detailedDescription:
i���ve had weird, unexplained things happen to me over the years but on 11-02-2010 it was visually strange.  it was a clear night  and i had just left fred meyers store at about 8:30 pm.  as i was driving up central ave. toward ocean blvd.  i thought i saw at the top of central and ocean a green light over the flashing yellow light.  my first thought was oh no they didn���t put a stop light up here!  but as i got closer i realized that the light (the same color as a green traffic light) was bigger and higher up then the flashing yellow light.  it looked like it it was behind the methodist church where there are big power lines.  it wasn���t like a regular green light because the light glowed and moved around, like millions of fireflies.  now my curiosity as to what i was looking at kept me driving toward it.  just as i realized what  i thought it was there was a flash and it shot straight up in the sky leaving a yellow trail of something that had been shot out of it.  i was so shocked at what i saw!  you hear about them but you never plan on seeing one.  total time from seeing it to it vanishing was about 30 to 45 sec. i went home as scheduled and told my children who believed my story.  i didn���t give it much thought after that.  
     a week later on 11-07-2010 i had just gotten out of my car from work at my apartment and  again it was around 8:30 pm when for some reason i looked up over my apartment.  it was again a clear night when i saw a white star move.  i continued to look at this ���star��� which as high as it was i figured it was over empire lakes which is behind my apartment building complex.  as i continued to watch the star it started to glow bright white and get larger.  then it shot off north leaving again a yellowish trail behind it shooting south.  i was not surprised but full of dread this time for some reason.  this also took about 30 to 45 secs.  again i went in and told the kids that i just saw another one.  again they believed me.
     the only thing that really makes all of this weird is that two days later i woke up at 10:00 am.  everyone in the apartment, including the cats were still asleep.  i found this odd as my 9 year old granddaughter who slept with me at the time is usually up at the crack of dawn.  my cat yuki cries at the door at 9:00 am every morning like clockwork to be fed.  i was the only person awake.  gradually, everyone was up and about and seemed sluggish.  i discovered that i didn���t feel well, had a headache and my throat and windpipe were extremely dry, bone dry.  my lymph nodes in my throat were swelled up to bursting and i had three horizontal cuts on the bottom right inside of my mouth.  i felt like this for about five days.  i didn���t get checked out by a doctor as i didn���t have any health insurance at the time.  i do have an appointment in march and i will ask the doctor to check out the marks in my mouth.

     previously in 2003 to 2004 i had lived off seven devils road in a secluded spot on the ocean on tokyo lane.  i didn���t write down exact times of the things that happen to me while the kids and i lived there.  i was constantly plagued by the coast guard helicopter flying directly and very close to my house at 2 or 3:00 in the morning several times a month.  when i say close i mean just over my roof top!  i thought that they may  be rescuing someone but there were never any reports of vessels needing assistance and they weren���t near the water.  one time i woke up to what i thought was a spot light over the house and thinking the coast guard was at it again.  i got up out of bed to flip them off.  just as my feet hit the floor i heard the coast guard coming!?  the light went out and i got back into bed terrified.  i heard the coast guard once again fly as fast as they could southeast toward bandon away from the water.  
i woke up one time with every joint in my body on fire.  when i say joint i  mean every place that a bone connects to another bone.  it was so painful i couldn't move. this lasted  for about 20 min. and then the pain faded away.  it was an uncomfortable feeling living there and night time was always stressful.  i was fatigued all the time, the children said they felt like they were being watched.  we left in 02-2004 and the children and i were grateful to leave and move back into town.  
apparently, it doesn���t matter where you live.

i have shared this with very few people.  my friend in california believes my stories and is greatly concerned.  hopefully, this will help and in some way be another piece of the puzzle.
content.summary: Green glowing orb over town, one week later white orb over apt.

content.detailedDescription: On approx the above day, i happened to take a picture from the beach at the inland seas maritime museum in vermillion ohio.  i wanted to get a picture of the rides at cedar point amusement park across lake erie as they are visible from there.  i zoomed the camera to its 3x max, and used the hightest density setting and took the attached picture.  i just wanted to see how it would turn out.  later that day, when i downloaded it to my computer and started looking at all the different things i had catured, i found an object in the sky that i can't identify.  when you compare in how much detail you can spot sea gulls and boats, its hard to imagine that the object in the sky just to the right of the sea gull is anything other than what is classically described as a ufo.  i'm wondering what your opinion is.
content.summary: A picture that i happened to take at lake erie has an unidentifiable object.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother in law and i was raccoon hunting behind my parents house saw a light shining down just thought it was the moon as we walked back toward the house i felt like we were being followed we turned and this strange object was hovering just above the cornfield it had a large round bright light on the front of it knowing no one would believe me i walked up to it as close as possible walked half way around it to make sure i was seeing what i saw!It was a weird blue metalic like color round on the bottom and top was like a roundish type dome i was close enough to touch if i chose to,the strange thing is that we sat down in front of the barn n looked up as if we were seeing it for the first time like a memory gap! then it slowly drifted back into the woods we went to the house to tell otheres we ran out side and a bright light flashed strait up into the sky from the woods my mom called the neighbors to see if they saw anything the neighbor said they didnt see any thing but that her husband went blind 5 minutes earlier? i was about 22 yrs old at the time i was home on leave from the navy my brother in law has since taken his life! years later i answered an ad for anyone with ufo experiences so i wrote n told them my story a few weeks later the perspon who had the ad was a reverend so the ad said any way i got a letter back from a woman who wrote and said since the reverand recived my letter he became very ill and could not respond she also said a black cloud was hovering over my head? i know this sounds very strange but it is very true! i am willing to take a polygraph exam or hypnosis to prove it if u so choose to do so.Please feel free to contact me my email is ogerr51@yahoo.Com thank you for allowing to tell my story.
                           respectfully
                           david w.Oliver
content.summary: Was hunting was followed from wooded area.

content.detailedDescription:
Between 12.30 and 1.30 pm, i finished my physic's lesson at bologna's university.
coming home, casually i loked on the sky, and i see for first four little light points, looks like stars, in movement.
ten minuts later, at home, while i was telling the event to my roomate, looking outside the window we saw another 3 light point, and when they pass our visual field, another 3 coming from the same point to the same direction.
the moviment was slowly, the first 3 go from west to est, and in a point, they turned nord, the following 3 make the same direction of the 3 before.
after this 6 light points, another 2 was came from the same point of the others, but one of this 2 went from west to east, and the other one turn south.
for the first time, i thinking they was satellites, but is impossible have in the sky 12 satellites in the same moment and everyone without fixed routes,
in relation of the movement, is also clear that this points don't followed the wind, absent on the ground.
we maked some picture but only 3 of these are clear.
in particular, zooming the third picture, it looks like a donut, and this this phenomenon is very similar to many other pictures and videos that i watch on youtube.
content.summary: 12 object likes moving star in the blue sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my back door step, smoking a cigarette when i saw 1 perfectly round, deep red light coming towards me overhead. at first i thought it may be the safety light that you see commonly on commercial aircraft but as it came closer i realised that the light was perfectly round and bright and was not flashing at all.

within 30 or so seconds another one appeared behind it, following the exact same flight path as the first. there were 8 in total that i witnessed within the next ten minutes. they seemed to be flying in pairs and each pair followed 2 definate indentical paths.

one pair would come toward me and take a smooth curve off to my left. the next pair would curve off to my right. they had a sound coming from them that i have never heard from an aircraft before. the best way i can describe it is to say that it reminded me of a 2-tone car alarm siren coming from approximately 1-2 miles away. i did think that was what i was actually hearing but this sound was in perfect timing with the craft being overhead. this sound would disappear as soon as the craft were out of sight and then reappear as soon as the next pair came into sight over the horizon.

they were perfectly smooth in their flight and were travelling at what i would say was a slighty slower speed than normal commercial passenger aircraft. the overhead height was approximately what you would expect of a aircraft being on it's landing path, maybe 30 minutes from landing. i could see no bodywork at all as you would on an aircraft, just a very bright red circular light.

i have uploaded 2 mp4 videos taken from my cellphone. the craft appear unsteady when in fact they moved perfectly smoothly. i am afraid i could not get my camera very still. if you turn up the volume very high 3 minutes into the first clip, you will be able to hear the 2-tone sound that was eminating from them. this sound was in fact much louder in reality and was the same volume and duration for each craft but the phone just couldnt quite pick it up well enough. i'm not sure why this sound was only picked up for a short time.

also, it appears that i was filming just 1 craft when in fact i was trying to switch from one craft to another. i had trouble getting the pairs into one shot but if you observe closely at 18 seconds into the second clip, you will see 2 crafts in the same shot. all 4 pairs travelled in this manner.

feel free to contact me via my supplied email.

kind regards,

paul
content.summary: Bright red lights

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving a parking lot at 7:45 a,m from work, i pulled onto hiway 160 in pahrump, nevada, i heading south-east. at a stoplight i looked out my front windshield at the clouds that morning. i noticed a huge shape straight ahead at the edge of a cloud and thought for a seconed it must be a military helo because it wasnt moving. being ex-military and having worked with helos i became immediately confused because it was totally the wrong shape. it was rectangle. then my mind took in the distance ahead of me and i knew it was larger than anything i had ever seen in the air and not moving. as i waited for the light to change i held my thumb up and measured it with my thumbnail pressed against the window, it was wider than my thumb. i drove toward it determined to get closer, my heart started pumping like crazy and as i got closer i could see more detail on the tailend and what i presumed the right side. it was grey/blue in color on the bottom and side and the whole horizontal-rectangle rear-end was darker to black and i could see tall verticle bars (blue/grey) from top to bottom set within the dark area all along the back. the sides and bottom seemed smooth and its edges separating top, bottom and back were sharp. it was hovering about 1,500 ft above ground just below the cloud. (i'm an ex-sky diver and can judge pretty good)
as i drove closer it began to move southwest/west into the heavy cloud hanging there. it dissapeard into the cloud as i turned off hiway 60 and homestead road. it had started moving down homestead road as it dissapeard. i parked the car and got out but it was no longer visable. it was a beautiful day that morning and it was clear except for that one darn cloud. as the cloud moved on i waited to catch a glimpse but saw nothing further. i still felt confused as to what i had just witnessed. i hesitated telling anyone, but eventually told my sister. i have not mentioned it to anyone until now. i saw something on tv about mufon and decided to contact you.
i was so intriged by it's size that i set my odometer on the car to zero and drove back to where i originally saw it. it was exactly 3 miles to the stoplight to homestead road. this thing had to be gigantic! i would love to know if anyone else saw this as well. it never made the papers.
content.summary: Rectangle, longer than tall or wide, square on rear, grey/blue in color, darker in rear w/tall rectangles in dark area.

content.detailedDescription: i took these fotos just south of denver colorado the night before last.  2/27/10.  we got home around 10pm, and i looked up at the moon.  the sky was rather overcast and there was a really cool ring around the moon, so i took a few pictures with my wife's new nikon camera.  she says its 12 megapixels.  when she showed me the fotos later there was this blue orb in the picture that i could not see at all when i was looking at the moon.  not at all.  it appears to be in front of the moon in the foto, but it doesn't seem to be one of those lens flares or something on the lens because it is out of focus in the second shot as much as the moon is out of focus.  it seems to move up to the right in the last foto too.  by definition this is a ufo to me, only because i just don't know what it is.  it seems to have a shadow ring around it too and it looks like it is semi solid but definitely 3-d not just a flat image.
content.summary: Blue orb in fotos that wasn't seen while taking pictures of ring around moon

content.detailedDescription: My neice was over and we stayed up late talking about ufo's. it was around 12 30 at night when she said that she saw a light come from the ceiling into the room with us and the light was behind me then like an hour later we took a short drive out to look and as soon as we  parked a light from the sky which looked like a beam of light struck me and you could see the light on my sweat shirt then a moment later a second beam came down and again you could see the light hit my sweat shirt, then after that we moved up the road a little and 2 more beams came but this time the light went further down into the car touching my legs and then after that the beams of light flashed around my car. the beam of light was white with a yellow tint and was the size if a softball. i really think that it was the ufo that i nicknamed flasher.
content.summary: A beam of light hit me 4 x's  (ref 21386)

content.detailedDescription: I was driving a hazardous material transport truck between cisco,tx. and rising star,tx. southbound on hwy 183.I noticed an extremely bright series of 3 lights in the sky.The lights werent moving or were moving very slowly.I passed a car that had apartly pulled over to view the sight and thought about pulling over myself.The shoulder was too narrow so i proceeded in a southerly direction toward the lights high in the southern sky.Then an additional 6 lights came on and the lights covered at least 1/4 mile of the sky.I turned my spot light on and shined it in the direction of the lights.The lights went out after a few minutes  and the sky was dark with no signs of any aircraft or aircraft lights.I could see planes in the far distance but nothing in the immediate area.Then the original first 3 lights reappeared for a few more minutes and went back out again.I was closer this time but still could see no signs of aircraft of any sort.The lights were very bright and impossible to not notice.There were 2 cars behind my truck and they were sure to have seen the sight as well as the folks that had pulled over.I studied the sky carefully.I have worked at night alot in my  life.I have seen the space shuttle re-enter the atmosphere,space junk fall and catch fire,comets,meteors of all sorts,apache helicoptors with lights underneath,and passenger jets with landing lights on.These lights were quite unique in comparision to anything ive ever seen.The light they admitted was white and bright with no colors at all.I would love to get a look at the radar at 8:02 pm.It was several small craft or one very large one.
content.summary: A series of large bright circular lights appeared in the night sky and then disappeared without a trace

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I noticed these lights when i stepped out to my car to grab a bag of clothes to bring in. i glanced to the north to what i thought were a few airplanes flying near each other, i looked again to notice that these lights were far to unusual to be typical aircraft. i ran inside to fetch my video camera and my father. what i saw was approximately 4 and 15 objects at any given time. they would group and scatter frequently moving in very erratic paths. the changed their direction effortlessly within a full 360 degree spectrum. their lights were pure white and pulsed without a distinguishable pattern. on several occasions many of them would disappear from sight only to reappear again in completely different spots. about 10 minutes after my dad at i began watching them, two jets came along and seemed to be attempting to get near the objects. the jets were easily recognizable compared to the objects, they moved in very linear paths, had the common red and blue aircraft lights and turned in stretched arcs. every time a jet came near one, the object would "bounce" out of its way at a sharp 90 degree incline, then would quickly change directions again. i was watching this from 18th and van buren looking straight north, starting around 8:30. we continued to watch for 15 minutes or so from this location until they all began to head further north, out of our viewing range, so we hopped in my car and headed out on mckinley, just north of twin lakes and continued to watch them dart back and forth across the sky until they eventually sped off to the south east, moving far too fast to keep an eye on them by car. i managed to capture a little bit on video, though most of the time they were moving too fast and changing direction too frequently for my camera to stay focused enough to see them. the video that i do have does capture the unusual sequence of lights blinking on and off, and reappearing elsewhere. i cannot say that what we saw was a group of ufos, or a strange government test, for that i am unsure, but these do defy a logical explanation on my behalf and i feel deserve some sort of investigation. i will release the video after email contact when i feel comfortable with whom contacts me. i do not wish to come off as arrogant, i just prefer not to open a can of worms. i am typically skeptical as far as unusual sightings go, but this left me unsure as what to think. thank you for your time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Strange lights above great bend, ks

content.detailedDescription:
i did not note the exact day of the event.I may even be off by a year. it was around 1991 and was a warm clear night. a friend and i where laying on our backs on a trampoline in the back yard of a house in a suburban neighborhood. 
 i noticed some small white objects flying directly over the trees to our left. i orignally mistook these objects as birds. i took a more interested look at the objects, as white birds in that area would be unusual. as i looked, these objects seemed to notice my friend and i as well. as the objects appeared to be following each other, the lead object flew directly overhead and stopped. the lead object was closely followed by 2 to 3 other objects and one straggler, about a second or two behind. directly over our heads at that point were 4, maybe 5, white, circular shaped objects. i would guess them to be 1 to 2 feet in diameter. they may have been spherical, but our perspective did not allow for an accurate interpretation. they were approximately 15 to 20 feet above our heads. these objects had formed themselves in a circle (like ring around the rosy). they hovered for maybe another second or two before they starting moving, still following one another, in this circular shape they had formed. within another second or two, they were moving at such a fast rate that there appeared to be a solid white circle hovering above us. they did this for another few seconds or more. then they stopped in a very quick manner to the same circular shape that they had originally formed. as my friend and i looked on in disbelief, these objects took off to our right from a complete stand still to a rate of speed that was extraordinary. they were beyond our sight in what seemed to be less than a second. 
 i have tried to rationalize what we saw that night and could not. what truly made these objects ufo's was the speed in which they could move, the exraordinary trick they seemed to do for our amusement, and the fact that during all this menuveuring they did not make one sound. they were completely silent. the objects did not seem to be illuminated, just white in color against the night sky. it was a very peaceful and pleasant experience and i felt a little proud to have witnessed it. i have told very few people of this incident over the years, simply because it is not something i would have believed myself have i not seen it with my own two eyes. anyhow, that was my only ufo experience, yet one of the most interesting experiences of my life.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 to 5 white circular objects-small, fast, silent w/ unusual behavior

content.detailedDescription: A flock of crows and seagulls about 50 or so were doing some very weird panic flying yesterday. never saw crows and seagulls fly in unison in a flock before for over an hour. near the loma verde weather station, which is a n antenna set up on a private residence near an elementary school.
content.summary: A flock of crows and seagulls about 50 or so were doing some very weird panic flying yesterday

content.detailedDescription:
Came out of the house at approximately 4:45 to start by vehicle.  i happen to look to my right across the lake and saw a bright light below the tree line.  the object did not blink nor did it move or make a noise.  i walked to the end of the deck as the light was unusual as there are no houses across the lake in this direction.  i got to the end of the deck when i looked to my right and then saw a second light.  again, same height, same color, same size, no noise.  i watched for a few seconds and then went into the house to prepare for work.  about 5 minutes later i came out of the house not thinking about the lights, got into my vehicle and then proceeded down the driveway towards the water when i noticed the lights once again. this time the lights appeared to be moving so i stopped and got out of the vehicle.  the two objects were now moving straight upward and were now above the tree line they remained the same distance from one another and at the same brightness.  i watched until they came to a stop they were about 8 times the size of the stars in the sky. the sky was totally cloudless.  at this point the object to my right seamed to move east while the second object appeared to be still. when the objects were in now a perpendicular position to the prior position they moved off in unison as if the first object was pulling the second.  i watched for a few minutes until they disappeared beyond the hills and headed southeast towards portland, maine.

day 2 february 23rd. time 9:40 coming home from work pulled into the driveway and once again walked up to my door in total darkness.  i always look up to the sky and to my amazement i once again saw what appeared to be the same two objects appear behind my house and pass over the lake and over the hills only this time heading in a more south direction. same as before no sound, same size as before with the same brightness. i watched the two objects move in unison for about 3 minutes until they disappeared.
i went into the house and went right to the computer and checked for other sightings and on the 19th of february a gentleman from raymond maine saw similar two objects.  just to add some additional information...I have had 2 previous unidentified experiences with one in particular that was investigated by govt. and military in 1969.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two light bulb size objects hovering then straight up then moving away together

content.detailedDescription: I was reading a book and got a little tired, so i turned off the light and was just relaxing in the dark looking out into our yard. last night the moon was overhead and lit up my backyard like a spotlight. but suddenly i noticed, there was a definite separate beam of light about 3 feet across coming straight down in one part of my yard. the light beam ended up moving towards one of my windows then held there about 3 feet away from it. our fruit tree in the backyard is covered in bright white flowers right now. first on the tree i saw what looked like a wave, that caught my eye, like when the heat is coming off the blacktop on a hot summer day. it obscured part of the flowers, but the other flowers and trees in yard were clearly seen. i have high end energy efficient silvered windows that block 99% of the uv so that was really weird. then i saw 2 lights in the fruit tree. little tiny like led's bright white, reminded me of when you take a flashlight and see the cat eyes looking back in reflection only much brighter. the lights were about the distance apart that eyes would be. i noticed because i wear glasses and they projected some light and they reflected off my lenses. then i saw what looked to be a projection on the white flowers on the fruit tree of a head and shoulders of a mottled brown and black reptile humanoid figure. it seemed to be mouthing words or something, no nose, reptile like folds where the nose would be, dark yellow eyes, it had a hand? with 3 claws one was bigger than the other 2, it motioned while speaking? teeth too, little points, they were white so they stood out against the color of the mouth. i couldn't hear anything, words or sounds for that matter. we have a marsh nearby and right now the frogs are mating so it is loud. i didn't even hear that when this happened. after a few minutes the beam, image and eyes disappeared. i looked outside and saw an out of place blue, white star scintallating and then it disappeared. if that star was projecting something and it hit my window from that angle then it would have hit the spot right there on my fruit tree. never saw that before.
content.summary: Beam of bright light in yard, projection of something blue white  object high in sky

content.detailedDescription: I am an arts and humanities doctoral student at the university of texas at dallas.  my husband and i were driving around the campus in our local neighborhoods looking for image opportunities.  while taking pictures of unusual clouds, i noticed a round rainbow among the clouds in the same part of the sky as the sun. additionally there seemed to be two intersecting lines of clouds that resembled a cross and at the intersection, a small oval shaped rainbow, brighter than the rest of the sky except the sun to my right.   i took about 7 pictures of this unusual phenomenon thinking i had caught a strange rainbow.  later when i downloaded the pictures from camera to computer, the first two pictures of this multi-colored phenomenon clearly shows a round, can-like object in the sky. i did not see the object with the my naked eye.  i only saw the objects after i downloaded the pictures on my computer.
content.summary: Taking unusual clouds near sun.  later on computer find objects clearly in pictures.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On 10/17/2008, i was leaving a high school football game (steel-high @
trinity in shiremanstown, pa.) around 9:15 or before 9:30pm.  i was walking
to my car with three adults (wife, son & cousin) along with two of my 
grandchildren (ages 2 and 5 at this time).  walking near us were other 
groups of people who also were walking to their vehicles.  there were 
patches of clouds in the sky that somewhat resembled an old ripped-torn
blanket.  the moon was slightly to the right from the direction we were 
walking.  the moon was pretty bright and was more than 3/4 full.  as we 
were walking, my eyes picked up on three rapidly moving lights in the sky.
at this moment they were slightly to the lower right side of the moon and
was moving slightly closer in our direction but still in moving in a
direction that they stayed a good distance above and in front of us.  i
honestly could not give you an estimate of their altitude, but i do know they had to be higher than the clouds because they were also transparent
behind the clouds, and as they traveled in clearer parts of the sky.  a
few moments after first seeing them, i immediately called out to my group
"look at these lights in the sky!!!".  but, as i was watching them move
away from us, i, somewhat in an embarrassing way, said "oh, it's not what
i thought it was".  but as i continued to watch them move further away and
almost out of sight, two sets of three lights (6 total plus the initial 3),
swooped down from opposite directions and lined up on each side of the
initial three lights (totaling 9).  they appeared to have slowed down as
they lined up, side by side, and suddenly, they bolted away at an incredibly
high rate of speed and disappeared from sight.  i've never seen anything
move as fast as these objects and when they were nearest to me, i could not
hear them.  also, they continued to elevate as they disappeared from site.
when the others sets of lights came into view, i excitedly yelled to my group
"oh my gosh! did you see that?  what was that?  i can't believe i just saw
what i saw!!  my wife was less than 10' in front of me and she had our two 
grand children on each side of her, and, my son and his cousin was probably
two steps or 10' ahead of my wife.  from my point of view, it appeared they
also was witnessing what i was seeing, and hearing all of what i was saying
from the point of me initially embarrassing myself telling them to look at
these lights in the sky.  but as i continued to excitedly ask them what
this was, my wife faced me and asked what i was talking about.  my son and
his cousin also did not hear me.  the other groups of people who were walk-
ing near us did not speak up or acknowledge any of my conversation, and
some were probably five to seven yards near me.  there was noise in the
background, the game was just ending, people cheering and talking pretty 
loud, the band was playing and the loudspeaker was still in operation - 
even though we were now a good distance away from the stadium.  also, these
lights had a bright yellowish-white color to them.  i initially tried to convince myself these three lights were just spotlights in the sky, only,
these lights did not have a beam of light emanating from the ground to them
and they also seemed to be traveling independently - not fixed or attached
to each other, even though they kept their distance, like in formation with
each other.  it was the most incredible light show i have ever seen...
when i arrived home around 10:35 or before 10:45pm, i called the local abc,
cbs, fox & nbc television stations hoping there were reports of strange
lights in the sky, and there were none.  i also called the local airport (harris-
burg international airport), and they had no reports.  even though i didn't
get validation that this occurred, i know what i saw, and there is no con-
vincing me otherwise....  i'm willing to submit to a lie detector test to 
validate all of what i have just said here in writing.
content.summary: 3 bright yellowish-white lights flew overhead and joined 6 additional lights and bolted out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: It was saturday, feb 20, 2010 about 12 noon when my friend and i were out mining in the area of randsburg, california.  i was driving down the road and i looked to my left and saw what i thought at first was a helicopter.  it was silver and blue and it was traveling along the bottom of the mountain right to left.  my friend and i both thought it was working around a mineshaft.  we pulled over because something didn���t look right.  at closer inspection it looked like three blocks one silver on top, and two blue on the bottom and about the size of a car.  i definitely no longer thought it was a helicopter.  the wind was blowing about 30 mph from our left to right.  we got the camera and took some pictures of the object.  the object then made a right turn and went diagonal up the mountain from left to right and when it got to the top of the mountain it went straight up and disappeared . it was hard to believe we saw something do what it did.  we talked about this on our way home and we remembered that we saw a fighter jet the day before flying around, although we don't know if that is significant or not.
content.summary: Dont know what it was but i have the pic  see below

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my front lawn and that night was a beautiful a full moon. i was in awe on how bright it was and all of a sudden i heard a puff sound followed by a counterclockwise spiral of a plume of smoke. as the plume of smoke made three full spirals an object shot out westward from the smoke, stopped as to get its composer for about three seconds, then shot northwest at an incredible speed. i was able to see the object for another two seconds til i lost it in the shadows of the night.  

i have been around aircrafts a good part of my life but never did i encounter anything like this. i like to admit i first thought it was an acrobatic aircraft but when i saw the object literally shoot out into view from the smoke and it stopped in mid air. the object had a round pod shape, i knew then we don't have anything that manuevers like that. this happened in late may or the first week of june in the year 2004.
content.summary: See description of event below.
